en: O Jehovah, rebuke me not in thine anger, Neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure.
hmr: Aw LALPA, lunginsenin mi kâwk naw la, Lunginsenin mi thunun bawk naw rawh.

en: Have mercy upon me, O Jehovah; for I am withered away: O Jehovah, heal me; for my bones are troubled.
hmr: Aw LALPA, mi lunginsiet la, ka chau zo ta sih a; Aw LALPA, mi sukdam rawh, ka ruhai hi a na zo vawng ta sih a.

en: My soul also is sore troubled: And thou, O Jehovah, how long?
hmr: Ka hringna khawm a lungin- zîng bêk bêk bawk a nih: Aw LALPA, nangin iengchen am i mi thlathlam ding a na?

en: Return, O Jehovah, deliver my soul: Save me for thy lovingkindness’ sake.
hmr: Aw LALPA hung kîr nâwk la, ka hringna sanhim la, I ngilneina leiin mi sandam la.

en: For in death there is no remembrance of thee: In Sheol who shall give thee thanks?
hmr: Thi hnung chun nangma hriet zingna a um si nawh a, Seola chun tuin am lâwmthu hril a ti che leh?

en: I am weary with my groaning; Every night make I my bed to swim; I water my couch with my tears.
hmr: Kân rûmnain ka châu tah, Zân tin ka zâlna chu tuiah ka suklâng a; Ka khum chu ka mitthliin ka sukhu hlak.

en: Mine eye wasteth away because of grief; It waxeth old because of all mine adversaries.
hmr: Ka mit hi lungngaina leiin a hung se deu deu a, A mi dotuhai leiin a hung tar deu deu tah.

en: Depart from me, all ye workers of iniquity; For Jehovah hath heard the voice of my weeping.
hmr: Nangni thil suol thawtuhai po po, mi mâksan vawng ro. LALPA chun ka ṭap ri chu a hriet ta sih a.

en: Jehovah hath heard my supplication; Jehovah will receive my prayer.
hmr: LALPA chun ka hnina chu a hriet ta sih a, LALPA chun ka ṭawngṭâina chu pawm a tih.

en: All mine enemies shall be put to shame and sore troubled: They shall turn back, they shall be put to shame suddenly.
hmr: A mi dotuhai po po chu muolphoin lunginzîng bêk bêk an ta, Kîr nâwk an ta, kâr lovin la muolpho thut an tih.
